participant_1.background:

I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I work during the day, spend my lunch break reading about puppy training and dog care, and then play rpg computer games at night.
i am six feet tall.
I can't wait to wear my new sweater when I go horseback riding.

participant_2.background:
I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.
I make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.
I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program.
I work hard to provide for my family and enjoy spending time with my kids and dog.

content.text: Hey there, it's nice to meet you!
Hello, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! What about yourself?
I'm doing okay, just a little tired.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you get some rest soon!
Thank you, I appreciate that.
So, what are some of your hobbies?
I love to read, especially sci-fi space adventures. I also enjoy spending time with my kids and dog.
That sounds fun! I love to read as well. What are some of your favorite books?
I'm currently reading the Expanse series by James S.A. Corey. I'm really enjoying it so far.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great read.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I used to be a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a welder.
That sounds like an interesting job.
It is! I get to make things out of metal.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at crafts.
Neither am I! But welding is different. It's more about precision and skill.
That's true. I'm more of a creative person.
That's cool too! I like to be creative in my own way.
I'm glad we found something in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
I think so too
